title: AlarmStorageStaticData (Struct)
text:
TYPE AlarmStorageStaticData : STRUCT
This structure bundles the data of one row of the alarm storage, that is static, i.e.
all the data except the latch variables (because the number of latch variables can vary)

rows.Name: liTimestapLast
rows.Comment: The timestamps of the last state change of the alarm

rows.Name: liTimestapActive
rows.Comment: The timestamps when the alarm became active

rows.Name: liTimestapInactive
rows.Comment: The timestamps when the alarm became inactive

rows.Name: liTimestapAcknowledge
rows.Comment: The timestamps when the alarm was acknowledged

rows.Name: iOffsetLast
rows.Comment: The offset of the last state change of the alarm

rows.Name: iOffsetActive
rows.Comment: The offset when the alarm became active

rows.Name: iOffsetInactive
rows.Comment: The offset when the alarm became inactive

rows.Name: iOffsetAcknowledge
rows.Comment: The offset when the alarm was acknowledged

rows.Name: liTriggerValueVal
rows.Comment: The trigger value as ârawâ value

rows.Name: iTriggerValueType
rows.Comment: A TypeClass value representing the type of the trigger value

rows.Name: udiAlarmId
rows.Comment: The internal id of the alarm, i.e. IAlarm.GetInternalID

rows.Name: udiAlarmGroupId
rows.Comment:
The internal id of the alarm group the alarm belongs to,
i.e. IAlarmGroup.GetInternalID

rows.Name: udiAlarmClassId
rows.Comment:
The internal id of the alarm class the alarm references,
i.e. IAlarmClass.GetInternalID

rows.Name: eState
rows.Comment: The current state of the alarm

rows.Name: usiPriority
rows.Comment:
The priority of the alarm according to the referenced alarm
class

rows.Name: liRemoteDeviceVal
rows.Comment:
The remote device value as ârawâ value
This parameter contains a pointer to the STRING containing the remote device name
-1 in case of NO remote device
